history.content: Hi there! Welcome to BPI's online support. How can I assist you with your banking needs today?

suggestions.suggestion: Hi there! Welcome to BPI's online support. How can I assist you with your banking needs today?

history.content: i need help with my credit card

I'd be happy to help you with your credit card concerns. Can you please provide more details about the issue you're experiencing, such as transaction disputes or account inquiries? I can assist you with your credit card accounts and provide information on how to manage your account online or through our mobile app.

history.content: what card is suitable for traveler

For travelers, I recommend our BPI Blue Mastercard, which offers no foreign transaction fees and allows you to earn rewards points on international purchases. You can also consider our BPI Gold Peso Mastercard, which provides travel insurance and concierge services. If you'd like to apply or learn more, I can guide you through our online application process or provide more information on our mobile app.
